title: View Changes Between Commits
description: In this lab, you will learn how to view the changes between two Git commits using the `git shortlog` command, which can be helpful for understanding the history of a codebase and identifying the cause of a bug.

meta.title: View Changes Between Commits in Git
meta.description: Explore how to view a summary of changes between two Git commits and understand code revisions.
meta.keywords: version control, git labs, code revisions, git, git playground, commit changes

verify.name: Verify for successful view
verify.hint: Please make sure you have completed the required actions.

i18n.title: 查看提交之间的更改
i18n.description: 在本实验中，你将学习如何使用 `git shortlog` 命令查看两个 Git 提交之间的更改，这有助于了解代码库的历史并确定错误原因。

meta.title: 在 Git 中查看提交之间的更改
meta.description: 探索如何查看两个 Git 提交之间的更改摘要并理解代码修订。
meta.keywords: 版本控制, Git 实验, 代码修订, Git, Git 游乐场, 提交更改

verify.name: 验证是否成功查看
verify.hint: 请确保你已完成所需操作。
